subject: Junit in a jar
msgSnippet: I d like to be able to have a single jar file, that contains JUnit and other jar files my project needs, and be able to run my Junit tests from the cmd line.
messageBody:
I'd like to be able to have a single jar file, that contains JUnit and other jar files my project needs, and be able to run my Junit tests from the cmd line.

In other words do something like:

>java -jar JunitTest.jar

Which would execute-> junit.textui.TestRunner MyTestClass

It would need to be with junit inside the jar (not outside on the classpath somewhere).

My directory structure looks something like this:


dist
JUnitTest.jar
lib
junit-3.8.2.jar


What tweaks do I need to make to the manifest?
What will the jar command look like both jarring up and executing?

Thanks.
